Learning AngularJS

22 Oct 2013

I’m building a new website in rails, and I decided to use AngularJS to make a single page application (SPA). A SPA is an application in which the page does not refresh between actions. Gmail is probably the most well known SPA. I don’t think my app needs a SPA to be successful, but it makes for a really nice user experience. And I wanted to learn AngularJS. So far I’ve had a couple problems that have slowed me down, and I wanted to document them here.

My First Real Experience With BDD

19 Aug 2013

I’ve subscribed to behavior driven development for a long time now. I use the word subscribe here to mean I read about it, and I talk about it, but I haven’t yet implemented it on any of my projects. Well I decided to actually give it a shot on a project I started recently, and it’s even better than I expected it to be!
